goblin.description: Cunning and cowardly, fights dirty, flees when losing

bandit.description: Desperate or greedy human, may negotiate or surrender

wolf.description: Pack hunter, targets weakest, retreats if alpha falls

skeleton.description: Mindless, relentless, vulnerable to blunt weapons

corrupted_mage.description: Former mage twisted by dark magic, unpredictable spells

bandit_captain.description: Skilled warrior, tactical fighter, inspires allies

dire_wolf.description: Alpha predator, intelligent, may have magical abilities

glass_mage_remnant.description: Crystallized mage, reflects magic, shatters into deadly shards

cult_leader.description: Charismatic, summons reinforcements, dark pact powers

stone_guardian.description: Ancient construct, slow but devastating, puzzle weakness
